content.title: Free Aortic Rupture
content.definition: Complete transmural tear of the aortic wall with free hemorrhage into the peritoneal or retroperitoneal space, representing a catastrophic vascular emergency with mortality exceeding 90% without immediate intervention.

classic_presentation: Sudden severe abdominal or back pain

surgical_approach.evar: Limited role in true free rupture
